app.cards.game

Class EvaluationHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • app.cards.game.EvaluationHelper

  •  class EvaluationHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    EvaluationHelper offers static helper methods for common tasks in hand evaluation.

    • Method Detail

      • getLongestSequence

        static CardSequence getLongestSequence(java.util.Set<Card> cards)
        The longest possible CardSequence within a Set of Cards
        Parameters:
        cards - Set of Card objects to be investigated for the longest possible CardSequence
        Returns:

        The longest possible CardSequence to be found within cards

        At each position in the returned sequence there can be multiple cards (each with the same rank as one another). The reason is that there might be multiple possible Straights within the sequence, some of which might be Straight Flushes. The final evaluation with regards to this is performed in Straight.makeBestStraight(CardSequence).

      • groupCardsByRank

        static java.util.Map<Rank,java.util.Set<Card>> groupCardsByRank(java.util.Set<Card> cards)

        Maps all Cards within cards to their Rank

        This method can be used as the basis for NOfAKind detection.

        Parameters:
        cards - Cards to be grouped by their ranks into a Map
        Returns:
        A Map object mapping Rank to a Set of all Cards with this rank

      • groupCardsBySuit

        static java.util.Map<Suit,java.util.Set<Card>> groupCardsBySuit(java.util.Set<Card> cards)

        Maps all Cards within cards to their Suit

        This method can be used as the basis for Flush detection.

        Parameters:
        cards - Cards to be grouped by their suits into a Map
        Returns:
        A Map object mapping Suit to a Set of all Cards with this suit

      • getNOfAKinds

        static java.util.List<NOfAKind> getNOfAKinds(java.util.Set<Card> cards)
        Returns a sorted List of all NOfAKinds found within cards, from best to worst
        Parameters:
        cards - Cards to be investigated for NOfAKinds
        Returns:
        A sorted List (descending in value) of all NOfAKinds found in the supplied Set

      • areAllCardsOfTheSameSuit

        static boolean areAllCardsOfTheSameSuit(java.util.Collection<Card> cards)
        Whether all Cards inside the supplied Collection have the same Suit
        Parameters:
        cards - Cards to be investigated
        Returns:
        true, if all cards in the supplied Collection are of equal Suit, false otherwise

      • areAllCardsOfTheSameRank

        static boolean areAllCardsOfTheSameRank(java.util.Collection<Card> cards)
        Whether all Cards inside the supplied Collection have the same Rank
        Parameters:
        cards - Cards to be investigated
        Returns:
        true, if all cards in the supplied Collection are of equal Rank, false otherwise
